overview: The years go by and suddenly you are not as young and promising anymore. Was this how life was supposed to be? Sandra is stressed about life's checklist and Veronica worries about losing her sexual capital. Emelie, the mother of small children, is happy that she has time to shower every day and Jonna is happy about the separation. Eleaver is tired of her partner never putting the socks in the laundry basket. And who can even lie down? Martina Carlstedt meets women who are all in their prime between 30 and 40.
title: Countdown
